title: New: Moko – Summon The Strength
body:
“_There are many laws, some of which I fight_’, a couplet that smothers you close to the frontal lobe of this 21 year old artist from New Cross; this girl means business.

_Summon The Strength_ is what looks like the debut single from **Moko**, and for a first track it really is a fully realised vision. What it has above all else is focus, one central idea, one groove – explore.

Watch the accompanying video below, and catch her at Dalston’s **Birthdays** on [April 2.](http://birthdaysdalston.com/event/moko-luke-osborne/)

Via [disco naïveté](https://www.facebook.com/disconaivete?group_id=0)
